name: PolyBird
description:
Flap your way thorough endless obstacles changing between 3 different birds at your will. Don't fall and don't hit the obstacles. See how far you can go. And remember to use the bird's weight to your advantage.

Normal : normal weight and flap strength

Bulky: Heavy bird, falls fast

Flighty: Very light, falls slow, flaps higher

Click on screen or use Left Control key to flap. Use 1 , 2 or 3 keys to change between the birds instantaneously. Enjoy!
